name: verify-issue-before-work
description: Verify GitHub issue state and existing implementation before starting work to avoid duplicate effort
author: ProjectOdyssey Team
use_cases: Verify issue state before starting work
Check for existing implementations in codebase
Avoid duplicate work on already-implemented features
Validate issue is still open and unassigned
Search for related PRs and branches
key_patterns: Use gh issue view to check issue state
Check for related PRs using gh pr list
Verify branch existence with git branch -a
anti_patterns: Starting work without checking issue state
Assuming issue description is still accurate
workflow: Read issue with gh issue view
Check for related PRs and branches
